item.title: Altair and ARAI signs MoU to advance technology and digital transformation goals
item.description: Altair and ARAI signed an MoU to leverage digital twin tech, data-driven design, and AI solutions, enhancing electrification, connectivity, and energy management. Leaders Stephanie Buckner and Reji Mathai noted ARAI's testing benefits. Altair's advanced simulation and data analytics will integrate into ARAIâ€™s consulting, promoting AI-driven engineering, cutting-edge technologies, and sustainable R&D processes.

item.title: Accelerating vehicle engineering from concept to road in 24 months
item.description: AI is revolutionizing the industry, promising increased efficiency and less mundane work. While AI is not yet capable of designing a car with the push of a button, its rapid advancement is reshaping how we learn and work. The automotive industry is undergoing massive change, ignited by the EV revolution and fueled by software-defined vehicles and autonomy.
